headline: A Look At Skyworks Solutions (SWKS) Valuation After CES 2026 Connectivity Launches
summary: Skyworks Solutions (SWKS) used CES 2026 to highlight its push into connected infrastructure, debuting the SKY66424-11 RF front-end module for smart homes and cities, alongside new automotive and e-mobility connectivity products. See our latest analysis for Skyworks Solutions. Despite the CES 2026 product launches, the share price has been under pressure, with a 30 day share price return of 11.45% and a 90 day share price return of 22.38%. At the same time, the 1 year total shareholder return...

headline: 2 Semiconductor Stocks with Competitive Advantages and 1 We Avoid
summary: Semiconductors are the silicon backbone of the digital revolution. The amount of data we ingest is also increasing exponentially, leading to elevated demand for chips with more processing power. This secular trend bodes well for the industry, which has posted a six-month gain of 50.1% and beat the S&P 500 by 39.5 percentage points.
